sentences.en: An arch that is foliated in the Gothic style.
sentences.cn: 那是有叶形饰物之拱门.

sentences.en: Gothic art the highest achievements in the construction area.
sentences.cn: 哥特式艺术的最高成就体现在建筑方面.

sentences.en: Gothic is an example of this small and historic grouping.
sentences.cn: 歌德语就属于这种使用者不多但历史悠久的语系.

sentences.en: Gothic tattoos run along her back, and deep knife scars trace her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她的背上布满了哥特式纹身，肩头上有深深的刀疤。

sentences.en: Gothic villain is a grotesque figure in literary works.
sentences.cn: 哥特式小说中的恶棍形象是文学作品中的另类角色.

sentences.en: He was more interested in states of mind than in " puerile superstitions, Gothic castles, and chimeras. "
sentences.cn: 他乐于描写心情, 而不愿意描写 “ 无聊的迷信, 尖拱式的堡垒和妖魔鬼怪. ”

sentences.en: I have been awed by the devoted spirit of Gothic wood carving.
sentences.cn: 我对哥特木刻的热忱精神感到敬畏.

sentences.en: It extracted a full measure of suspense and horror from the conventional machinery of Gothic.
sentences.cn: 它继承了哥特式小说的传统手法,吸取了其制造悬念和恐怖的全部技巧.

sentences.en: It is a classic style of Gothic buildings.
sentences.cn: 这是哥特式建筑的典型样式.

sentences.en: The cathedral was eventually completed in 1490, though the Gothic facade remains unfinished.
sentences.cn: 那座大教堂最终于1490年建成，但其哥特式风格的正面一直未能完工。

sentences.en: The choir of the church is a fine specimen of Gothic architecture.
sentences.cn: 教堂里的唱诗区是哥特式建筑风格的优秀典范.

sentences.en: The house sat on the hill, huge, a useless fortress in Gothic stone.
sentences.cn: 房子在山上, 非常大, 是一座用哥特式石头砌成的无用的堡垒.

sentences.en: The images were Gothic or Byzantine rather than classical.
sentences.cn: 这些形象属哥特式或者拜占庭式而非古典式。

sentences.en: The tall Gothic windows glinted in the afternoon sun.
sentences.cn: 高大的哥特式窗户在夕阳的照耀下闪闪发光.

sentences.en: This is occurring in a Gothic fantasy world of action games.
sentences.cn: 这是一款发生在哥特式幻想世界中的动作游戏.

sentences.en: This novel is not science fiction, nor is it Gothic horror.
sentences.cn: 这本小说既非科幻小说亦非哥特派恐怖小说。

trans.tran_en: the Gothic style of building was common in Western Europe between the 12th and 16th centuries and included tall pointed  arches  and windows and tall  pillars
